name: aoijs.canvas
description: aoijs.canvas - Create and edit images in aoi.js with ease.
author: lordex

scripts.test: tsc && echo Done compiling! && node dist/__tests__
scripts.api-gen: tsc && echo Done compiling! && node api-gen.js && echo API file generated/updated.
scripts.publish: tsc && echo Done compiling! && node api-gen.js && echo API file generated/updated. && npm publish
